title: What's your most influential programming book in your professional career
ques:
I have this Design Pattern book that I find myself going back to over and over again.  It is very nicely written.  It is:

Head First Design Patterns




What is your most influential book in your programming career?

answers.ans:
I do a lot of data modeling and try to adhere to common data model patterns. 
So this would be my most important book:

Data Model Patterns,  Conventions of Thought

For me it was 


Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
Patterns of Enterprise Application Architecture by Martin Fowler
